SqlMap.select: SELECT EL.LOCATION_DATA_SEQ ,EL.EMP_NO ,EL.SHEET_NO ,EL.EXTENSION_LINE_NO ,EL.EMP_STATUS_DV ,EL.FIXED_FLG FROM T_EMP_LOCATION EL INNER JOIN MST_SHEET MS ON EL.SHEET_NO = MS.SHEET_NO WHERE EL.EMP_NO = #EMP_NO# AND MS.FLOOR_PLACE_DV = #FLOOR_PLACE_DV#

SELECT EL.LOCATION_DATA_SEQ ,EL.EMP_NO ,EL.SHEET_NO ,EL.EXTENSION_LINE_NO ,EL.EMP_STATUS_DV ,EL.FIXED_FLG FROM T_EMP_LOCATION EL INNER JOIN MST_SHEET MS ON EL.SHEET_NO = MS.SHEET_NO WHERE MS.FLOOR_PLACE_DV = #FLOOR_PLACE_DV#
